page.title: 16PUBLIC SERVICES IN WALSALL
page.content:
{Walsall Metropolitan Borough Council provides many services for the{266,000 {people}of Walsall. Some{Council {departments}- Education,Housing,Social Services,Environmental Health,Library and Recreation-provide services direct to the community.The other departments -Chief Executive's and Town Clerk's, Legal Services,Architect's,Engineering and Town Planning and Treasurer's- provide services to other Borough and County Council departments and ensure the smooth running of the Council.
{Other services}in Walsall include: Citizens Advice Bureau,Council for Community Relations,Courts,DHSS, District Valuer,Electricity,Fire,Gas, Health,Hospitals,Industrial Promotion, Job Centres,Media,Police,Samaritans, Travel-buses and trains and Water.
